reviews.text:
I recently visited Five Star Fast Food in Skopje and had a delightful experience. The restaurant offers a wide variety of fast food options, from burgers to sandwiches, all prepared with fresh ingredients. The service was quick and efficient, making it a great spot for a quick meal on the go.

The highlight of my visit was the cheeseburger, which was juicy and flavorful, complemented perfectly by crispy fries. The portion sizes were generous, and the prices were reasonable, offering good value for money.

The atmosphere was casual and welcoming, with clean seating areas and friendly staff. Whether you’re dining in or taking out, Five Star Fast Food ensures a satisfying experience. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a tasty and convenient meal in Skopje.

Huge tasty burgers for a very affordable price.
This is what you call real fast food. They have your burger ready in a few minutes.  The staff are quick and friendly.  The burgers are the best all around.

***If anyone likes my honest reviews then please like my post and follow my google account***
-Thanks
One of the best fast food restaurants ever! It’s got a lot of great food options, including: burgers, toasts and so much more! It even has delivery!

Definitely the best burgers in the city, without a grain of second doubt. You basically never wait more than 2 minutes for your food, and its always fresh and warm. I haven't seen that in any other fast food restaurant here. This is the definition of "fast food". I recommend 7 to absolutely everyone who likes traditional, not so fancy but absolutely juicy and tasty as hell burgers !
It's decent, but its far from the best burgers/grill/fast food in the city, just "OK", and its stupid how they don't accept payments with cards in 2024, probably to dodge like 2% of taxes, come on.
